mapper.sql: id,author_id as authorId,title,thumbnail,comments, is_comment as isComment, sync_status as syncStatus,status,summary,views,weight,category_id as categoryId,create_time as createTime,update_time as updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, create_time createTime, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, "%Y" ) `year` FROM plumemo_posts ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time, "%Y" ) DESC
SELECT SUM(comments) commentsTotal, SUM(views) viewsTotal FROM plumemo_posts posts
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, "%Y-%m-01 00:00:00" ) archiveDate, COUNT(*) articleTotal FROM plumemo_posts GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time, "%Y-%m-01 00:00:00" ) ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT posts.`id`, posts.`author_id`, posts.`title`, posts.`thumbnail`, posts.`comments`, posts.`is_comment`, posts.`sync_status`, posts.`status`, posts.`summary`, posts.`views`, posts.`weight`, posts.`category_id`, category.name as categoryName, posts.`create_time`, posts.`update_time` FROM plumemo_posts as posts LEFT JOIN plumemo_category as category ON category.id=posts.category_id WHERE posts.id=#{id}
SELECT FROM plumemo_posts WHERE DATE_FORMAT( create_time,"%Y-%m-01 00:00:00")= DATE_FORMAT(#{archiveDate}, "%Y-%m-01 00:00:00" )
mapper.update: UPDATE plumemo_posts SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE plumemo_posts SET comments = comments + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
